Author: SHossain#0007
Content: with every update of iguana, you must stop it and start it.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: generally the start script does stop it first, compile and run latest.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: on mainnet, it is just `./m_notary`

Author: gt#2812

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: yes

Author: gt#2812
Content: i understand the line in m_notary_testnet

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: the iguana daemon can't detect any changes in other source file until it starts again. think of iguana like komodo or other coin daemon, if you change the coin.conf file, you need to restart the daemon to start using that.

Content: nope. looks good

Content: make sure the z_address is not in the same server/computer
